declarations.description: A web component to progressively enhance any video or iframe element to have fullscreen capabilities.
declarations.name: FullscreenControlElement

members.name: buttonText
members.description: The visible text displayed inside the fullscreen button.

members.name: buttonLabel
members.description: Optional aria-label text for the fullscreen button. Falls back to the visible button text when empty.

members.name: enterFullscreen
members.description: Enters fullscreen mode for the component and its contained element.

members.name: toggleFullscreen
members.description: Toggles fullscreen mode on or off.

events.name: fullscreen-control:enter
events.description: Fired when the element enters fullscreen mode.

events.name: fullscreen-control:exit
events.description: Fired when the element exits fullscreen mode.

attributes.name: button-text
attributes.description: Visible text for the fullscreen button. Supports the {name} token to inject the accessible name of the slotted media element.

attributes.name: button-label
attributes.description: Optional aria-label for the fullscreen button. Supports the {name} token. When omitted, the aria-label matches button-textâ€”use it only when you need different screen-reader wording.

slots.description: Default slot for a video or iframe element to be enhanced with fullscreen capabilities.

cssProperties.name: --fullscreen-control-button-inset-block-start
cssProperties.description: Block-start (top) position of the fullscreen button.

cssProperties.name: --fullscreen-control-button-inset-inline-end
cssProperties.description: Inline-end (right in LTR) position of the fullscreen button.
